name: Great Minds
body:
### Welcome to Great Minds! Please feel free to download the APK and play the game on your Android device.

Link to APK Download: https://github.com/jeppzone/GreatMinds/blob/master/GreatMinds.apk?raw=true

After playing the game, we would very much appreciate if you would take 5 minutes and answer some questions in this questionnaire:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/14yQ8RU9h08sWF3u2AL8l39QEUSbV0XeIdUHifES6EE8/viewform
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
